name: gust

effect_entries.effect: Does not hit Pokémon under the effects of fly.

effect:
Inflicts regular damage.

If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.

Whips up a strong
gust of wind.

gust of wind.
